subtitle: Ideal as a starter, or for a buffet.

method.text: Remove and finely chop the stalks from the mushrooms. Heat half the oil in a pan. Add the chopped mushroom stalks, onion and garlic. Cook for 3-4 min until tender.
Stir in the breadcrumbs, pancetta, Parmesan, parsley and seasoning. Cook for 2-3 min. Remove from heat.

Arrange the mushroom caps, hollow side uppermost, in a lightly greased shallow ovenproof dish. Divide the stuffing between the mushrooms, pressing the stuffing down slightly. Drizzle over the remaining olive oil.
Place in the oven for 15 min, or until piping hot and golden.

title: Mini stuffed mushrooms
